metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9720 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer overflow in the subtitle decoder in Libav 12.3 allowsattackers to corrupt the stack via a crafted video file in Matroska format,because srt_to_ass in libavcodec/srtdec.c misuses snprintf.

criterions.comment: vice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
gst-libav1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
